alert.note: Alert for Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 7:23PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Texas and eastern Cimarron Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 723 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Keyes, or 18 miles southwest of Elkhart, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Keyes, Eva and Sturgis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
